subject: p15207316
Impression: AP chest compared to through. Severe cardiomegaly is longstanding, though slightly improved since. Pulmonary arteries are chronically enlarged indicating pulmonary arterial hypertension. Moderate pulmonary edema and small right pleural effusion have increased since. Transvenous right atrial and left ventricular pacer and right ventricular pacer defibrillator leads are in standard placements, unchanged. No pneumothorax.
